OrganizationName.ConstraintDescription: User all lowercase, dashes, or numbers (my-org) between 1 and 6 characters in length. Must not start with a number, and must not start or end with a dash.

ProjectName.ConstraintDescription: User all lowercase, dashes, or numbers (demo-project) between 1 and 20 characters in length. Must not start with a number, and must not start or end with a dash.

CodeBuildDockerImage.Description: The ECR name (i.e '{account_id}.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/{image_name}:0.1.0') to biuld the image with.

CodeBuildBucketName.Description: The bucket name in which CodeBuild artifacts will be stored.

CodePipelineBucketName.Description: The bucket name in which CodePipeline artifacts will be stored.

MicroserviceBucketName.Description: The bucket name in which cloudformation templates and lambda functions will be stored.

JenkinsBackupBucketName.Description: The bucket name in which jenkins backups and restores are saved to

Domain.Description: The domain name that this service will fall under.

HostedZoneId.Description: The Route53 hosted zone id that this service will fall under.

KeyPairName.Description: Name of an existing EC2 KeyPair to enable SSH access to the ECS instances.

LambdaBucketName.Description: The bucket name in which Lambda artifacts will be stored.

LoadBalancerLogsBucketName.Description: The bucket name in which load balancer logs will be stored.

SecretsBucketName.Description: The bucket name in which KMS encrypted secrets will be stored.

EncryptionKeyName.Description: The name of the encryption key used by the microservice to encrypt/decrypt secrets.

NotificationEmail.Description: The email to send notifications to for this microservice

IAMRole.Description: The IAM role that has access to all of the projects resources.
